Applies to

  • PCI DSS Requirement 12.7

What to Do

Conduct background checks on new employees.

Why

A background check assures that a potential new employee is not a known criminal and is representing themselves truthfully.

When

Conduct background checks on new employees before hiring.

How

Contact an agency that can perform background checks. Attorneys and private investigators can often provide this service for a small fee. Instruct Human Resources staff to conduct background checks before hiring new employees who will have access to cardholder data or the cardholder data environment.
